Full time, ON- SITE, BOSTON Senior Full Stack Software Developer

What it’s all about

You are an experienced engineer who knows how to build the solid APIs and backend processes that power our applications. You have a passion for scalable high performance architectures. But you look for the one thing no big tech company can offer you: a chance to make a great impact – changing the way people live around the globe in a fast-paced and demanding environment.

What it takes

  - At least 5 years of relevant experience

  - Experience in developing large-scale web applications using cloud services

  - Strong backend experience: Node.js

  - Understanding of HTTP protocol, RESTful APIs, SaaS models

  - Knowledge of database architecture (MongoDB or similar)
Education - BA/BS in Computer Science or a related field
